description: This is a market on whether Paul George or Devin Booker will score more points in the Game 5 Conference Finals matchup between the Los Angeles Clippers and the Phoenix suns, scheduled to take place at 9:00 PM ET, June 28, 2021. The market will resolve to “George” if Paul George scores more points than Devin Booker, or “Booker” if Devin Booker scores more points than Paul George. If Paul George scores the same amount of points as Devin Booker, the market will resolve to 50 cents George and 50 cents Booker. If the match is postponed to a date after July 5, 2021 or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve to 50 cents George and 50 cents Booker. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
